title: 1 dead, 2 injured after crash in Winslow Township
body: One man died and two other people are seriously injured after a car crash Saturday morning in Winslow Township, officials said.Township police, fire and EMS were dispatched to the intersection of the White Horse Pike and Wiltseys Mill Road around 8:30 a.m. where they found a two-vehicle crash.Officials said Anthony V. Rebardo was traveling east on the White Horse Pike with a minor when he didn’t account for the road’s bend at the intersection with Wiltseys Mill Road. He collided into another car traveling north on the road.Rebardo was transported to Virtua Hospital in Voorhees where he was pronounced dead, police said. The minor passenger in his car was transported to Cooper Hospital with serious injuries.The driver of the other car was airlifted to AtlantiCare Regional Medical Center in Atlantic City with serious injuries.Police said there are no charges at this time and the crash remains under investigation.Note to readers: if you purchase something through one of our affiliate links we may earn a commission.
